column4: mhh, my login screen flickers on 9.10 after the upgrade some time ago... I can only use one Videocard it seems
I had big issues with my video adapter and 9.10 i ended up swapping out the card.
damn my FX5200 didn't work well anymore
my 8600 did well one one monitor
I could have probably fixed my problem some other way but I didn't want to spend a lot of time on it.
yeha popped out hte old one and dropped in another changed from ATI to nvidia
I have nvidia and it now happens... when I start GDM it starts
with the old one everytime I dragged a window I'd get these artifacts on my desktop looked like a meteor shower or something
I dropped to init 1 and ran nvidia-xconfig and things worked better for me.
which driver you running the binary or nv ?
can't even recover off a CD?
